meanings.definition: Make (previously unknown or secret information) known to others.
meanings.sent1: She reveals her surprise party to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The magician reveals the hidden card to the audience.
meanings.sent3: The detective reveals the culprit in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise reveals a new day full of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map reveals the location of the hidden chest.

meanings.definition: Cause or allow (something) to be seen.
meanings.sent1: The clouds part and reveals the bright sun.
meanings.sent2: The artist reveals her masterpiece at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The curtain suddenly reveals the actors on stage.
meanings.sent4: The key unlocks the door and reveals a secret room.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight reveals a path through the dark forest.
